Spring 2022 Home Archived Issues Switch Journal on Scholarworks

/*Issue 30

*/ How To Date a Visual Novel

Photograph by, Alex Haney: Unsplash.com © Copyright Free 2022

How To Date a Visual Novel

By Tobi Tobar

Website

Abstract

WIP

Article Body

Intro: Introduce Visual Novels and their origin, how MUDs are relative, and their differences.

-What are MUDs? Explanation to MUDs and their origin.

-What are Visual Novels? Explain ViIsual Novels.

-How MUDS and Visual Novels Relate. Their relationship to each other.

-Thesis: Visual Novels are an upgrade to MUDs. How Visual Novels are an evolution to MUDs.

Par1: Delve into the different types of Visual Novels, and how this is an evolution to reading. (you may talk about the influences of manga/anime nowadays)

-Visual Novel Types

-How they can be considered a type of literature (Article mentions + references)

-How I think developing a Visual Novel for the youth can make reading fun as well.

Par2: Talk about Visual Novels that aren’t dating sims

-Start with Novel Types that aren’t Visual Novels

-EX: Ace Attorney, Danganronpa, Zero Escape

-How rare it is that majority of Visual Novels revolve the idea of dating (aka dating sims)

Par3: Interactive Film relative to Visual Novels + Close relatives

-Majority Markiplier Film Novels :A date with Markiplier, A heist with Markiplier, In Space with Markiplier

-Minecraft: Story Mode as a Film Novel

-Point and click games such as my childhood games: Reader Rabbit, Freddy Fist, Putt Putt, etc

Par4: Dating Sim hellscape (their evolution, and modern day dating sims)

-The first dating sim

-Clannad and how it’s a masterpiece

-Modern dating sims such as Hatoful Boyfriend, Dream Daddy, Blush Blush/Crush Crush, and maybe personal dating sim I’ve made

-How many of these have a twist, especially Doki Doki Literature Club

Conclusion: Visual Novels are a step above reading a book or just text, giving the “reader/player” a chance to take the reins.

-Reiterate how Visual Novels are better than MUDs

-Reasons such as: The Visual Aspects, branching storylines, and multiple choices

-These also can support literacy and make it easier for visual learners like me/help concentrate on the topic

Subtitle
